author: Saichi2Taiko
action.info.attack: atakuyte etim poddannym. vyberite poddannogo i najmite lyubuyu krasnuyu cel', esli vy hotite napast'
action.info.capture2: zahvatite gorod. goroda vyrabatyvayut zvyody kajdyy hod, kotorye vy mojete napravit' na uluchshenie imperii
action.info.endturn: ezavershite hod dlya polucheniya bol'she resursov i dvijeniy poddannyh
action.info.move: dvigayte poddannogo. vyberite ego i najmite na lyubuyu sniyuyu cel'
action.info.reward.population: eto povysit naselenie blijayshego goroda. kogda naselenie stanovitsya dostatochno bol'shim, gorod uluchshaetsya i prinosit bol'she resursov
action.info.train: sdelayte poddannogo v etom gorode.  poddannye mogut byt' ispol'zovany dlya issledovaniya mira, dlya atak na vragov ili dlya zatshity gorodov
actionbox.building.requiredtech: vam nado issledovat' {0} dlya etogo, najmite knopku 'teh. drevo'.
actionbox.insufficientfunds: u vas nedostatochno zvyozd dlya pokupki. najmite 'sled. hod dlya polucheniya bol'she zvyozd.
actionbox.unit.toomany.info: etot gorod ne mojet vyderjat' bol'she poddannyh. uluchshite ego dlya polucheniya bol'shego mesta.
building.ability.attract: vyvodit jivotnoe v blijayshem lesu kajdye tri hoda
building.ability.embark: poddannye, chto dvigalis' syuda budyut prevratsheny v lodki, kotorye mogut hodit' po vode.
building.ability.limited: vy mojete postroit' tol'ko odno {0} v gorode.
building.ability.patina: {0} rastyot cherez kakoe-to vremya, tak chto poprobuyte postroit' eto tak bystro, kak vozmojno.
building.ability.road: stroyte dorogi, chtoby soedinyat' goroda so stolicey. soedinyonnye goroda pribavlyayut 1 naselenie, kak nagrada. tak je dorogi dayut dop. peredvijenie dlya vseh poddannyh.
building.ability.route: sozdayot torgovyy put' {0} k lyubomu drugomu {1} v raduis 5 plitok.
building.ability.ruin: ruiny drevnih civilizaciy. oni mogut soderjat' cennye vetshi! idi tuda poddannym, chtoby issledovat' ih.
building.ability.unique: {0} mojet byt' postroeno tol'ko odin raz.
building.capital.owner.former: {0} yavlyaetsya byvshey stolicey imperii {1} , seychas okkupirovano silami {2}.
building.produce.multiply.polaris: ({0} za kajduyu {1} zamorojennuyu plitku v mire)
building.produce.multiply2: proizvodit {0} za kajdoe ryadom {1} kajdyy hod
building.produce.multiply2.polaris: Produces {0} for every {1} frozen tiles in the world
building.restriction.on: doljno byt' postroeno na plitke s {0}.
building.village.owner: eto derevnya, ne prenadlejatshaya ni odnomu plemeni
consent.approval.info: To improve Polytopia with usage statistics and to store your high scores and settings we need your approval to access to some personal data. You can read more about what data we collect in our privacy policy. (You can revoke your approval at any time in the 'Throne Room')
consent.approval.title: Welcome to Polytopia!
consent.disabled.info: To save personal data like high scores and usage statistics we need you approval. For more info, read our privacy policy.
consent.enabled.info: You currently allow Polytopia to access some personal data to improve service and store your high scores etc. For more info, read our privacy policy.

tooltip.ability.convert: etot poddannyy mojet prevratit' vraga v vashego pri atake.
tooltip.ability.dash: poddannyy mojet atakovat' posle hoda, esli vrag v dostigaemom radiuse.
tooltip.ability.destroy: udalite lyuboe stroenie v predelah vashih granic, zamechatel'naya perestroyka imperii.
tooltip.ability.disband: uvol'te lyubogo vashego poddannogo i poluchite polovinu ego stoimosti obratno.
tooltip.ability.escape: poddannyy mojet peredvigat'sya vnov' posle ataki.
tooltip.ability.fly: poddannyy mojet letat' nad lyuboy territoriey bez zamedleniy ili uskoreniy.
tooltip.ability.fortify: poddannyy poluchaet bonus zatshity, kogda nahoditsya v svoyom gorode. dvoynoy bonus so stenoy.
tooltip.ability.freeze: poddannyy zamorajivaet svoih vragov. kogda ih atakuyut, oni ne mogut dvigat'sya.
tooltip.ability.freeze_area: poddannyy mojet zamorogit' sosednie plitki vklyuchaya vrajeskih poddannyh.
tooltip.ability.freeze_auto: poddannyy zamorajivaet sosednie plitki i poddannyh pri peredvijenii.
tooltip.ability.glide: vse nesanochnye poddannye dvigayutsya na l'du.
tooltip.ability.grow: poddannyy vyrastet ili stanet chem-to drugim.
tooltip.ability.heal: poddanyy mojet vylechit' drugih v okruge.
tooltip.ability.navigate: poddanyy mojet dvigat'sya po lyuboy territorii, daje esli neobhodimo issledovanie.
tooltip.ability.persist: poddannyy mojet delat' atakovat' vnov', esli do etogo predydutshaya cel' byla ubita.
tooltip.ability.skate: poddannyy poluchaet dvoynoe peredvijenie po l'du, no na zemle on teryaet sposobnosti i dvigaetsya tol'ko na 1 plitku.
tooltip.ability.sneak: poddannyy mojet prohodit' mimo vragov bez zamedleniya.
tooltip.ability.splash: poddannyy nanosit rasseyyannyy uron po vsem blijayshim poddannym pri atake.
tooltip.ability.swim: etot poddannyy - amfibiya i mojet peredvigat'sya po vode i sushe.
tooltip.tile.capture.tip: peredvin'te poddannogo syuda, chtoby zahvatit' gorod!
tooltip.tile.explore: issleduyte plotshad', chtoby uznat', chto ona soderjit!
tooltip.tile.extract.convert: etot resurs mojet byt' prevratshyon v poddannogo
tooltip.tile.extract.research: vam nujno issledovat' {0} dlya dobychi etogo resursa
tooltip.tile.extract.stars: dobud'te etot resurs dlya mgnovennogo polucheniya zvyozd
tooltip.tile.extract.upgrade: dobud'te etot resurs dlya uluchsheniya goroda
tooltip.tile.level.polaris: zamoroz'te {0} bol'she plitok, chtoby poluchit' sleduyutshiy uroven'
tooltip.tile.limit: etot gorod ne pojet vyderjat' bol'she poddannyh.
tooltip.tile.monuments: monumenty dayut dop. ochki vashey imperii!
tooltip.tile.research: vam nujno issledovat' {0} dlya peredvijeniya zdes'
tooltip.tile.road: postroyte dorogu, chtoby soedinit' etot gorod so stolicey.
tooltip.tile.ruin: peredvigayte poddannogo syuda dlya izucheniya drevnih ruin.
tooltip.unit.actions.move: najmite na sinee pole dlya dvijeniya.
tooltip.unit.actions.none: net dostupnyh deystviy. najmite 'sled. hod', chtoby peredvigat' etogo poddannogo snova.
tooltip.unit.city.capture: najmite 'zahvatit'' chtoby vnesti etot gorod v vashu imperiyu
tooltip.unit.city.capture.flying: letayutshie poddannye ne mogut zahvatyvat' goroda
tooltip.unit.city.capture.next: etot gorod budet gotov k zavhvatu na sleduyutshem hodu
tooltip.unit.decay.now: etot poddannyy rasstvoritsya k koncu etogo hoda.
tooltip.unit.grow.now: budet rasti do {0} k koncu hoda!
tribepicker.categories.specialtribes.des: sborka plemyon, kotorye nemnogo udivili etot mir...
tribepicker.disabled.description: plemya otklyucheno, ono ne mojet byt' zadeystvovano vami ili ii.
tribepicker.freetribe.description: eto plemya besplatno i ne mojet byt' kupleno dlya razblokirovki mnogopol'zovatel'skogo rejima.
tribepicker.title: vyberite plemya
tribepicker.underconstruction.descriptio: my etshyo rabotaet nad vneseniem novyh plemyon. rastim kul'tury, razrabatyvaem yazyk i arhitekturu. eto dolgo, poymite. sleduyte @Midjiwan v Instagram ili Twitter i bud'te pervym, kto uznaet o novom plemeni!
tribes.aimo.info:
spokoynye i mudrye {0} obitayut v samyh surovyh, vetryannyh i vysokih gorah,gde oni obreli mir po sredstvom meditacii v vechnom svete vechera. 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}'.
tribes.aquarion.info:
s glubin okeanov poyavlyaetsya davno poteryannaya civilizaciya! ih absolyutnaya izolyaciya dala im special'nye akvaticheskie sposobnosti, chto ne izvestny nikomu drugomu.

{0} imeyut nemnogo drugoe drevo tehnologiy i dostup k unikal'nym amfibiyam-naezdnikam, chto nikakoe drugoe plemya ne mojet vyvesti.
tribes.bardur.info:
perejit' surovuyu zimu lesov plemeni {0} ne lyozkaya zadacha,no {0}, kajetsya procvetaet tut.

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}'.
tribes.cymanti.info:
The {0} are a breakout group of Polytopians who moved to the swampy forests and learned to live with the Ciru Bug, which attaches to their faces and merges with their brains. 

Led by their Shaman, the {0} train gigantic bugs, use their enemies to fertilize their fungi farms and utilize crippling poisons to vanquish all who would threaten their marshy home!
tribes.elyrion.info:
misticheskie {0} oboronyayut svoi lesa so svetloy magiey i svirepyh ognedyshashih drakonov! 

 otnosyatsya k prirode, kak k svyatyne i ne mogut vyrubat' lesa ili ohotit'sya na jivotnyhm, vmesto etogo oni nachinayut igru s unikal'noy zacharovannoy tehnologiey, kotoraya prevratshaet obychnyh jivotnyh v sil'nyh politavrov.
tribes.hoodrick.info:
pojeltevshaya osennya listva lesov {0} yavlyayutsya otlichnoy maskirovkoy dlya ih obitateley. 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}'.
tribes.imperius.info:
bol'shie gory i zelyonye luna. klimat idealen dlya vyratshivaniya fruktov. 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}' .
tribes.kickoo.info:
belye peschannye plyaji s kokosovymi pal'mami. izobilie fruktov i ryby. dobro pojalovat' v domik {0}. 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}' tech.
tribes.luxidoor.info:
jiteli {0} vedut ochen' komfortnuyu jizn', ukutanymi v luchshie fioletovye shelka. no smogut li oni vyjit' snaruji ih prekrasnogo goroda? 

{0} nachinayut igru s bol'shoy stolicy.
tribes.oumaji.info:
pohojee na beskonechnost', solnce blagoslovlyalo pustynyu, dom plemeni {0}.

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}'.
tribes.polaris.info:
{0} zatocheny v dalyokih ledyanyh tundrah na veka, no osvobodilis' neizvestnym gaami s siloy, kotoraya rasshiryaet ih nenastoyatshuyu ledyanuyu territoriyu dal'she, chem pozvoleno pogodoy. 

 s moguchimi sanyami i mamontami, misticheskie {0} namereny pogruzit' mir v lyod i prevratit' zemli v zamorojennyy ray. 

{0} nachinaet igru so sposobnosti k zamorozke vokrug territorii s pomotsh'yu muni.
tribes.quetzali.info:
plemya {0} poklonyaetsya pticam-bogam krasnoy zemli i jivut v garmonii s ih natural'noy simmetriey kubisticheskih djungley. tak je oni osedlali bol'shih neletayutshih ptic. 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}'.
tribes.vengir.info:
nahmurivshis', ih otpravili v neblagopriyatnye pustoshi. budut li oni terpet' eto unijenie ili poboryatsya za mesto pod solncem? 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}' i sil'nyh mechnikov.
tribes.xinxi.info:
oni nachali svoyo puteshestvie v gorah, okrujyonnyh krasivymi cvetutshimi vishnyami.

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}' .
tribes.yadakk.info:
{0} nachali, kak kochuetshee plemya v prekrasnyh i surovyh halivofyh ravninah. teper' oni glavnye torgovcy v okruge, kotorye podklyuchayut k svoey imperii mnojestvo torgovyh putey. 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}'.
tribes.zebasi.info:
{0} procvetayut v tyoploy savanne, vyratshivayut kul'tury v obogatshyonnoy pochve dlya prokormki ih moguchego naroda. 

{0} nachinayut igru s tehnologiey '{1}'.
tribes.zebasi.news: vse zarabotannye den'gi na zebasi investiruyutsya v proekty po vyrabotke solnechnoy energii.
